pages.title: Human-like Engaging
pages.text: Farseer will attack any that are human-like

pages.title: Farseer Effects
pages.text: Farseer will discombobulate players when targeted,by scrambling their inventory and flashing them with illusions

pages.title: Stabilizer
pages.text: These effects can be deterred by wearing a helmet, with the new enchantment 'Stabilizer'
